page.title: 17Barnhill Quarry - disused.
page.content: There is a scheme to fill in this large industrial site with three million tons of household refuse.The Quarry owners have proposed that the Quarry should be reclaimed over 20 years and that the land could then become a park.The anti-tip Sodbury Vale Action Group have objected to the scheme.They claimed that the tip would be too close to the dwellings and shops of Chipping Sodbury,and that there would be too many pests like rats,flies,and seagulls.They were worried in case the Quarry would become a health hazard while the rubbish is decomposing.Pollution would become a great problem and the amount of traffic caused by the proposed dumping would be at the rate of one heavy lorry per minute through Chippng Sodbury High Street.The proposal has been shelved for the moment.
